unnormalised: Hey guys, smart meters are popping up everywhere, even in my building in Andheri! Wondering if anyone's seen a dip in their electricity bill, especially with the AC blasting during this Mumbai heat.
normalised: Hey guys, smart meters are popping up everywhere, even in my building in Andheri! Wondering if anyone's seen a dip in their electricity bill, especially with the A C blasting during this Mumbai heat. My uncle in Kerala says his bill shot up after getting one. He thinks it's a conspiracy by the power company to fund Onam celebrations, ha ha! Maybe it's more transparent, less "bijli chori" happening? Still, I'm craving some biryani while pondering this.
